title: Meditation: Living Presence – with Body Scan (2021-07-15)
itunes:title: Meditation: Living Presence – with Body Scan
description: Meditation: Living Presence – with Body Scan (2021-07-15) - A key pathway to full presence is awakening through the body. This meditation guides us through a body scan, relaxing and receiving the play of sensations. We then deepen attention to the breath, and rest with the rhythmic waves of breathing, experiencing the background of the whole domain of physical aliveness.
